original_definition: 'household combined washer-drier' means a household washing machine which includes both a spin extraction function and also a means for drying the textiles, usually by heating and tumbling;
generated_definition: 'household combined washer-drier' means a household appliance that combines the functions of a washer and a dryer, typically used for laundry purposes.

Article 1: 2.   This Regulation shall not apply to household combined washer-driers and household spin-extractors.
Article 2: ‘household combined washer-drier’ means a household washing machine which includes both a spin extraction function and also a means for drying the textiles, usually by heating and tumbling;
Not Article: Household combined washer-driers have particular characteristics and should therefore be exempted from the scope of this Regulation.
